Reviews.Title: Vizio surprised me.
Reviews.Author: Musical Snob
Reviews.Content: I looked for two months at HD tv's.  I wanted the best 42 inch I could get for around $550.00.  Needles to say, there is a bunch of TV's that fit this criteria.  They all look good in the store and all the specs are pretty much the same.  Lo and behold, I saw this Vizio for 480.00 at Amazon.  Crossed my fingers and took a chance.  This Vizio is Great.  Easy to set up, just the right amount of connections in the rear, and what a great picture.  In my small dark living room, TV programs VIA antenna is super and my DVD's never looked so good, not to mention my Blu-Ray's. Fantastic.  Some people might not be satisfied with only 2 HDMI plugs, but I run everything thru an AV receiver.  So two HDMI is more than enough for me.  I don't play video games so the 60Hz refresh rate is fine for me.  I watch a lot of sports, but I have not noticed any shadows or trailer effects.  I have had this set for more than a month and I have not had any problems.  Don't be turned off by the low price.  Sometimes buying HD tv's can be a crap shoot, but from my experience, you won't go wrong with this Vizio.

Reviews.Title: Wouldnt buy any other brand
Reviews.Author: gingergrl88
Reviews.Content: I bought this exact tv from Walmart. Never had any issues with it at all. Great picture, the sound was great for us for internal speakers, obviously if you want surround sound or theater quality get surround sound speakers. Lasted us 2 years and probably would have lasted much longer, but our son decided to swing one of my husbands golf clubs in our living room...oops! Since the prices for Vizio tvs have drastically reduced since our original purchase we can get a much larger size for the same price we originally paid! I am now shopping for the same exact tv for our bedroom, and a larger Vizio for our living room. Great brand in our opinions!

Reviews.Title: I like it!
Reviews.Author: mapache
Reviews.Content: You can read all the technical reviews you want elsewhere.  I got this TV after researching what I wanted and it fit the bill.- 1080p HDTV- 2 HDMI inputs- 42" screen so I can actually SEE what's on from across the room- LCD TV = lower usage costs than my old tube tellie- SRS technology for easing the impact of commercialsWith the Amazon TV Low Price Guarantee and free shipping with Amazon Prime, I was convinced to buy it here.  Ordering and delivery was pain-free, just as I like it.Next on the list will be the SquareTrade warranty.

Reviews.Title: Solid and reliable
Reviews.Author: Skullywag "Skully"
Reviews.Content: This makes my 3rd Visio purchased, and I couldn't be more pleased.Excellent picture, great sound. Good value. Only $19 a year to operate!(exceeds energy star ratings)Being a semi-budget model, it doesn't have some of the features more expensive models do (PIP most notably), but I knew this going in.I had the opurtunity to buy a cheaper tv during the pre-Black Friday and Black Friday sales, but most of CHEAP models offered this year are the no-name brands with a noticably poorer picture.I decided purposefully to buy a LCD over a LED...LED's are notorious for tinny or just plain bad sound due to the thin panels not having enough room for decent speakers. The poor sound of LED's CAN be overcome by hooking up a sound bar or set of 2.1 pc speakers...but I chose not to go the "addon to make it right" route for this one.  It will be for the bedroom, and sound quality is quite good on it's own.

Reviews.Title: Great for price
Reviews.Author: Loretta S. Hiller "RC & Lori"
Reviews.Content: This is a great TV for the price. Good picture resolution, great features. We are counting on Visio's past quality record to keep us happy with this TV for several years.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Linda Baker
Reviews.Content: I ordered the Vizio 42" TV for my new house.  It arrived on time and in perfect order.  It was incredibly easy to hook up and has a great picture.  Not doing this kind of thing before I didn't realize you need better speakers than the TV provides. So my next purchase will have to be speakers.

Reviews.Author: Kleb Treble
Reviews.Content: Great quality video, above average quality audio= perfect for my apartment. It isn't too loud, but has a capacity to fill the entire apartment. I would definitely buy this TV again!

Reviews.Title: Failed after several months
Reviews.Author: John Doe
Reviews.Content: After just 8 months the screen started turning green.  I had a major retailer come out to try and repair and I was told that Vizio has a known problem (logic board failure).  It was going to cost hundreds to fix.  Getting warranty work was impossible.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: C. Destrempes "cedest"
Reviews.Content: We purchased this around 8-10 months ago (not through Amazon - for televisions I like to be the delivery method  :)  ).  It is fairly solid television.  Reasonable set of controls, reasonable set of inputs, etc.  I run an XBox 360 and our cable box through different video inputs.  There is only one "complaint" we would have...however it really isn't one that should surprise anyone: the sound quality is average (at best).  The main thing we have noticed about sound is that it can be very difficult to have dialogue be loud enough to clearly hear without, in an instant when there is a change in the action or music, being blasted out of the couch.  Most of the time we can run the volume at a setting of 18 or so.  In some movies/television shows we find ourselves turning it up to 30+ so the dialog is clear (and the characters are not whispering or being quiet or anything of the sort) - it seems to be more prevalent of an issue when there is significant background noise/activity so it is if the mix levels are "off".  So, we have found we need to keep the remote handy and, depending on the movie or television show, be ready to adjust the volume up (for dialogue heavy scenes) and then back down when the action (or whatever) is about to begin.  It's annoying...although we have become used to it.  Again - it isn't all of the time...just enough to be annoying...but not enough I have yet done anything about it.  I need to stop being lazy and pick up external speakers/etc. so we can control it through another mechanism and bypass the built-in speakers.  :/

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: JMF5505
Reviews.Content: TV is great. Bought it on sale for a great price. No complaints.I will definitely buy another Vizio TV

Reviews.Title: execellent value
Reviews.Author: cowboy
Reviews.Content: Have had the TV for a couple of months now. While I have had no trouble with it at all, the picture quality does not seem to be quite as good as my Panasonic 720 50" which is several years old now. This TV is being used as a secondary set, so it is not that big of a deal. In fact if I didn't have the Panasonic to compare it to, I probably could not have told the difference. I shopped around and Walmart seemed to have the best price in our area. Amazon beat that by 50 dollars. When you throw in free shipping (item delivered to my front door), plus about 35 bucks in sales tax, the picture quality clears up very nicely!

Reviews.Title: Previous VISIO great, had problem with this one
Reviews.Author: Susan Kollar
Reviews.Content: We bought a smaller LCD VISIO HDTV two years ago and have been very happy with it, although some actions movies had minor dithering (correct term?) So, needing another TV for the LR, we bought this one a month ago. Picture quality is MUCH better, easy set up, etc. However, two days ago it would turn on, but not go past the VISIO logo. Checked the batteries in the remote, no gotz. But, we then realized the buttons on the TV didn't work, so am returning to Target (sale price: $479) tomorrow for same model. Hope this was just a glitch, we really like the price and sound and picture quality. This model gets lots of good reviews, so we're taking the chance to replace it w/ the same model. We figure every company/product these days has some bad apples. Wish us luck.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Douglas C. Williams
Reviews.Content: Shipped as promised.  Unpacked and had it working in 5 minutes. Good picture and color. Only complaint (and this applies to all other manufactures) is that the MUTE button are RETURN BUTTON are too damn small and hard to find.  If they were larger and more prominate I would not have to fumble every time the phone rings.

Reviews.Title: Piece of junk
Reviews.Author: Charles Chrencik
Reviews.Content: This TV,s sound card died only 1.3 years. The picture is crummy and I replaced with a Samuung 40" 530. What a difference. I give this Vizio TV a 1 star --rated poor.

Reviews.Title: Great value, works great
Reviews.Author: Andrew Adams
Reviews.Content: This tv has worked out great for us.  I think we had to look up how to set up the volume a special way, but it wasn't hard to do.  I just wish it had a smaller increment of time on its sleep timer and wish it had a wake/alarm like my old RCA.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: Joseph Santiago
Reviews.Content: Could not ask for a better dealVery pleased.  Looks and performs like brand new.  Very. Very pleased. Thanks.s

Reviews.Title: So so satisfied
Reviews.Author: Phyllis Murphy
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent excellent product! Right size for the space. Beautiful picture! This is a winner Amazon!I am a satisfied customer!

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware!
Reviews.Author: Nosloptrainman "Mr.K."
Reviews.Content: Stay Away!Be Afraid, Be VERY Afraid!Unreliable!Unbelievable!Once out of warranty, it TURNS IN TO A DOORSTOP!Volume turns ITSELF UP and then the TV turns off!What?Now a hazy and gray bar has developed across the middle of the screen and will not go away!What a disappointment this has been.Plus, the Vizio Customer "Service" is good for nothing more than to tell you, "Oh, well, I guess you have no option but to replace it, AND, want you to buy another Vizio.Are you kidding me?My hope is that THEY all have a Vizio, through a great employee discount and they get the same awful TV's that their customers get STUCK with.Goodbye Vizio!FOREVER!!

Reviews.Title: Where's the sound?
Reviews.Author: sadiesmom
Reviews.Content: Six months after purchase and the sound on the TV comes and goes.  Sometimes the sound goes off completely; other times the TV is emitting a loud unexplainable buzz.  Not happy at all!!!

Reviews.Title: Short life
Reviews.Author: CajunProf
Reviews.Content: Model worked fine until it was just over 1 year old. Then had total power failure and would not turn on. Not much else to say. Fine TV if you want to watch, say, just the 1 Super Bowl.

Reviews.Title: I love my TV!
Reviews.Author: S. Lewis
Reviews.Content: Oh my gosh I love this TV! This picture is gorgeous and so is the sound. It's just the right size for my home and I haven't had any problems with it and I purchased it months and months ago. It has plenty of inputs for all my devices and paired with my new Roku player I don't need any smartTV functions!

Reviews.Title: Can't beat VIZIO
Reviews.Author: Shaun Riehle
Reviews.Content: This my 3rd VIZIO & the best flat screen tv brand out there.Never had any technical problems with this brand.The best & only brand I trust.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: bass pace
Reviews.Content: amazing sound! low bass but the surround sound is better then a sound bar! beautiful picture! i recommend this for a decent sized bed room

Reviews.Title: easy set up
Reviews.Author: ron
Reviews.Content: Easy set up and great picture.  would buy again.  Keep the deals coming.  What else can i say.  you can buy el

Reviews.Title: I'm still saying wow!
Reviews.Author: T. Fagerhaugh "chefs-mom"
Reviews.Content: Very truthfully I must say that our old TV was sooo bad that anything would have been an improvement but, so far this has been excellent. For the first time in a long time I can see the golf ball when it lands on the green (I am a big golf fan) and the fairways are green and glorious.

Reviews.Title: Good tv
Reviews.Author: Faye Vincent
Reviews.Content: Seems to work fine I use it for Xbox not watching tv. It is great for Xbox  No tv enoki up

Reviews.Title: vIIZIO 42." tv
Reviews.Author: M. Charlene Sprague
Reviews.Content: WE LOVE IT.  wE ARE HAPPY OUR 14 YEAR OLD TV broke down. MUCH BETTER PICTURE AND A LITTLE LARGER THAN OUR 36" TV.

Reviews.Title: Perfect TV!
Reviews.Author: ndpeggy
Reviews.Content: This 42" LCD flatscreen was a great choice for my daughter's apartment.  Lightweight, big enough but not too overwhelming, and sleek in appearance.  I purchased it because of the cost value, but honestly, the quality surprised me.  Picture, color, sharpeness and features included are more than you would expect for a TV in this price range!

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Valerie Bartlett
Reviews.Content: This was for our Club House.  I have one in my home and think it is great!  Good Picture! Valerie

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: andrew
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this TV at a retail store while it was on a great sale.I have been using it for about a week now and it is so much better than my last TV, but then again it is the first full HD TV i have owned. The picture quality is excellent, the speakers are typical TV speakers (they are OK quality, but at least they face Forward not backward like some) good enough to use for watching movies and such if you're not too picky. For me i use an AV receiver for all my audio so i don't use the built-in speakers. That being said, the sound that the TV outputs to the AV receiver is much better than my last TV; i could really tell the difference. It's easy to hear movie dialogue without turning up the volume too loud, the SRS surround is great.Pros:  - The price was right, basically was a 42" for the price of a 40"  -  Has good video/audio settings including a customizable equalizer.  -  Energy efficient (if that matters to someone)  -  Looks sleek and has a fairly low profile with decently thin borders (about 1 & 1/2 inches on the sides and top).Cons: - It doesn't have a ton of connections (2 HDMI, 1 VGA, 1 Comp, 1 AV out, 1 RCA, 1 USB, 1 coaxial cable) I think the new version might only have 1 HDMI.  - The USB seems to be used ONLY for viewing pictures, would have been nice to be able to play movie and music files from it.Conclusion: So far I am impressed by the video quality, now i just hope it will last me many years and it will be the perfect TV. I will update if anything happens to it.

Reviews.Title: This TV is just Great!!!
Reviews.Author: Deb2theC "Debcha"
Reviews.Content: VIZIO E422AR 42-Inch 60Hz Class LCD HDTV with VIZIO Internet Apps (Black)  This TV is so fantastic... I had one of the first generation HDTVs and it was o.k. But it doesn't hold a candle to this one! (That one was a PAN------.) This one has fabulous color, the sound is awesome, as this one works with my surround sound much better,and its really nice also, to have the picture automatically adjust to the lighting in the room. My Papa bought it as an early Xmas present for me as the volume was always really funky with my old one (I have the best Dad on the face of the planet!) and I keep on thanking him over and over.  BUY THIS TV!

Reviews.Title: Very happy!
Reviews.Author: Mary
Reviews.Content: I wasn't too sure about this tv when I ordered it, but after setting it up (which was done 10 minutes after it arrived at my house), it is absolutely BEAUTIFUL!!  I am very pleased with the picture.  The sound could be a little better, but we usually use our surround sound so it's not a big deal.  In general, this was a great purchase!

Reviews.Title: nice TV
Reviews.Author: Roger
Reviews.Content: This TV has a nice picture and was a good value. I would recommend it to anyone looking for an HDTV.

Reviews.Title: Dying after a year, known issue, customer service is no help
Reviews.Author: John L. Griffiths
Reviews.Content: Title says it all.The longer version:Google the words vizio television vertical lines, and you'll get dozens of pages of results -- this is something that has happened to many, many people, and the company clearly doesn't care to acknowledge it, much less make it right either before or after the sale. The best thing you can hope for is that this problem will happen immediately, so that the company will replace the entire unit (which is the only real fix for it).I bought this television in July of 2012. Flash forward to the beginning of September 2013 -- a vertical line two pixels wide (about the width of a fine-tip Sharpie mark) appears about a third of the way across the screen. It's diagnosed by customer service as a 'panel issue'. The unit is out of warranty by two months, and I am informed that all they can do is provide a phone number to an authorized repair center -- and that to replace the panel on this (originally) $428 TV, the cost will be $725.To summarize:* Vizio TVs have a widely known defect that the company will not address or make any effort to correct after the 1 year warranty has passed.* The only repair solution costs nearly twice what the TV itself does.* If you do buy this TV, be aware that there is a very good chance that it will start developing permanent and highly visible lines for which the only solution is replacement.

Reviews.Title: Great TV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: mbellmyer
Reviews.Content: The 42" Vizio is great. The picture and sound is good. I bought it from Amazon Warehouse Deals and the price was awesome!!

Reviews.Title: 73 Watts!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: RosieAndMe
Reviews.Content: For me this set replaced a 5 year old 46 inch Samsung that was notably power hungry when running 10 hours per day.  Doing the math this set at 73 watts will pay for itself in less than 4 years plus the features run circles around the old Samsung that I paid over $2,000.00 for.

Reviews.Title: Good while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Lemuel
Reviews.Content: I bought this last month while it was on sale for $399. Before this set we had a Panasonic that lasted us one year without any problems. We bought the Vizio because we were renting the Panasonic from Aaron's and we had some money to buy a new set instead of continuing to pay 77$ for another year. We noticed that the quality was not great compared to the Panasonic, especially our blu ray movies. We were disappointed but what you pay for is what you get. All of a sudden one morning it stopped working. We searched online and found many forums that had the same problem and were told they were SOL. Since it was purchased within a 45 day period we took it back to the point of purchase and got a refund. Overall it's a decent tv, while not great. We purchased a Panasonic VIERA TC-L42U30 42-Inch 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV from Amazon right after we left the store. I don't mind paying more knowing that it'll last longer than 36 days.

Reviews.Title: VIZIO E421VO
Reviews.Author: LAK
Reviews.Content: I bought a Vizio E421 VO about a year ago and have used it only for a few hours/week. Now it stopped working. Vizio support staff are of no help. It will cost over two hundred dollars to fix it.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT AND GREAT SOUND QUALITY
Reviews.Author: DJ Ozzy
Reviews.Content: I ONLY HAD $400 BUCKS TO BUY SOMETHING NICE FOR MY NEW APARTMENT I LOVE IT GREAT SOUND QUALITY AND  AMAZING PICTURE QUALITY I HIGHLY RECOMMEND TO THIS TV TO ANY ONE WORTH EVERYSINGLE DOLLAR!!!

Reviews.Title: Don't Buy Vizio
Reviews.Author: revmns
Reviews.Content: Purchased this tv and after only one year of use it now has a vertical blue line on the screen. Vizio will do nothing since the warranty expired only by two months and the local tv repair shop said it is not worth to fix it....Will not buy from Vizio ever again.

Reviews.Title: RIP OFF
Reviews.Author: ambarnes
Reviews.Content: VIZIO E421VO 42-Inch Class LCD HDTV  I purchased this tv on 4/1/12.  Our tv stopped working on 8/9/12,  After contacting Amazon I was told it was past the 90 day limit.  We contacted Ace Electronix and was told that we could exchange or get a refund.  At first we wanted an exchange, that is until we found out that we had to pay $160.00 to return it back to Ace Electronix, then we would have to pay antoher $160.00 to have it shipped back to us plus a $15.00 dollar charge for a box since we don't have the orginal box.  I asked to speak to a manger I was put on hold then the rep came back on and told me the manager would have to get back to me.  This is the ripoff of the year!!!  Do not buy from Ace Electronix.

Reviews.Title: NOT as described
Reviews.Author: I. Mindel
Reviews.Content: I have several Vizio TV sets, and decided to buy this 42" Model # E421V0.  I did the research and both the Vizio website and the AMAZON websites post pictures that show the TV with numerous AV inputs that are simply NOTon the TV as delivered.  I had to return it.  Both AMAZON and VIZIO post pictures on their website showingtwo separate inputs....one for composite and one for component.  I needed this so that I could hook upseveral different devices, including over-the-air antenna, a cable box, and a DVD recorder/player.When the TV arrived it only had ONE input, a combined component/composite which allowed the user to hook up one or the other....but NOT BOTH !!!  The TV also did NOT have several other inputs and outputs that were clearly shown in the pictures....including the audio analog output that I used to send the TV sound to my stereo receiver.I called Vizio and they said that all the new models only had the single hookup.  Obviously they cost-reduced out the extra inputs and outputs.  BUT.... they did NOT change the model number, and the pictures posted for the TVwith this model number on both the Vizio website and the AMAZON website show the TV with the extra connections.But when the TV arrives, they buyer finds out that the connections are simply not there. Actually, some people might call this false advertising.VIZIO E421VO 42-Inch Class LCD HDTV

Reviews.Title: one star is really too much
Reviews.Author: mengela
Reviews.Content: i got this from limitless liquidators which turned out to be an ironic name because i turned the tv on once, set settings and left it. a minute later the cable guy was asking me how i turn on my tv...it shouldn't have been off. i couldn't tell you how the picture looked because i never watched anything on it. never buying a vizio or from limitless liquidators again. neither should you.

Reviews.Title: Worst Tv
Reviews.Author: Brebre
Reviews.Content: Had this tv for a year and broke right after the manufactors warrinty went out. I will never buy another vizio tv. Dont waste your money. I bought one line at the top took it back got another lasted few months then the Hdmi port broke someone had to come out and fix that now this time the whole tv went out.

Reviews.Title: Busted out of box
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: This TV was busted right out of the box. Bought from Target. Menu is going crazy and scrolling through selections as though the down button is stuck in place. Will be returning to Target in morning. Thanks Vizio for making me re-pack, carry out to car, drive 20 min to Target, stand in line for 20 minutes, go pick out another TV, stand in checkout line, carry back to car, drive 20 min back home, carry inside, unpack again, set up again, and hope that it works. For how much people pay for this product it should work.

ProductInfo.Features:
42-inch class (42.02 inches viewable) HDTV with CCFL backlight and full HD 1080p resolution
100,000:1 contrast ratio for deeper blacks and brighter whites across programming
SRS audio technologies for virtual surround sound and volume smoothing
Play full-screen slideshows of your JPG images from connected USB devices
Two HDMI inputs for connecting your HD sources
ProductInfo.Name: VIZIO E421VO 42-Inch Class LCD HDTV
